Shipping included.  Paypal F&F preferred.

Bump.  Still for sale at a very fair price.  I don't sell often, but you can look me up on eBay as Section_103.  My feedback is pristine and you may be able to see I've sold other cards in the same $ range recently.
Last bump before it goes to eBay tonight or tomorrow.  Offer me $125 and I'll take it.
